input_text:
Job Title: Social Media Ads Expert

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Social Media Ads Expert at Digital Marketing Agency
Job Type: Full-time EmploymentCompensation range - 70k annually
Job Description:We are seeking a talented and experienced Social Media Ads Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in managing meta ads, LinkedIn ads, and TikTok ads, with a proven track record of driving successful campaigns. As a Social Media Ads Expert, you will be responsible for ad copy iteration, ad creative and graphic design, data analysis, A/B testing, Zapier and CRM integrations, form/call/WhatsApp campaigns, and full-funnel campaigns.
Responsibilities:
Develop and execute strategic social media advertising campaigns across multiple platforms including meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok.Create compelling ad copy iterations to optimize performance and achieve campaign objectives.Design eye-catching ad creatives and graphics that resonate with target audiences.Conduct thorough data analysis to track campaign performance, identify trends, and make data-driven recommendations for optimization.Implement A/B testing methodologies to refine targeting, messaging, and creative elements.Utilize Zapier and CRM integrations to streamline workflows and enhance campaign effectiveness.Execute form, call, and WhatsApp campaigns to generate leads and drive conversions.Develop and implement full-funnel campaigns to nurture prospects through the customer journey.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, or a related field.(Preferred)Proven experience in managing social media advertising campaigns, particularly in meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok.Strong proficiency in ad copywriting, creative design, and graphic editing tools.Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights.Experience with A/B testing methodologies and campaign optimization techniques.Familiarity with Zapier and CRM integrations for automation and workflow enhancement.Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.Results-oriented mindset with a commitment to achieving campaign objectives and delivering measurable results.
If you are a passionate and results-driven individual with expertise in social media advertising, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume and portfolio at sofia@emetdigital.com showcasing your relevant experience and accomplishments. Join us in making a meaningful impact in the digital marketing landscape!

Experience Level (if available): None

(Preferred)Proven experience in managing social media advertising campaigns, particularly in meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok.

Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights.
Experience with A/B testing methodologies and campaign optimization techniques.
Familiarity with Zapier and CRM integrations for automation and workflow enhancement.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Results-oriented mindset with a commitment to achieving campaign objectives and delivering measurable results.
Please submit your resume and portfolio at sofia@emetdigital.com showcasing your relevant experience and accomplishments.
